title: How do I break text threading across Indesign frames
content:
I am working with numerous small text frames on a modular grid in Indesign CS3, Now that all of the text has been flowed into the frames I want to disable the break threading—without altering what is currently in the frames—so I can work with my hierarchy and not need to keep tweaking frame heights. Is there a way to do this?

And I want to do it _without_ copy-pasting everything in reverse order.
author: Dunwich Type

comments.content: There's a script for that named SplitStory. Go to [http://www.adobe.com/products/indesign/scripting/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229210450/http:/www.adobe.com/products/indesign/scripting/ "http://www.adobe.com/products/indesign/scripting/"), select the "Scripting resources" tab, and download the "InDesign CS3 Sample Scripts".
